articles.title: 19 Chairs project sees Es Devlin, Tom Dixon and more customise a seat - Dezeen
articles.description: London designers Tom Dixon and Morag Myerscough, provocateur Max Siedentopf and set designer Es Devlin are among 19 preeminent makers and artists, who have reimagined a wooden seat as part of the 19 Chairs project.
articles.content:
London designers Tom Dixon and Es Devlin and provocateur Max Siedentopf are among 19 makers and artists who have reimagined a simple wooden chair as part of the 19 Chairs charity project.
